definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Metal-wheeled chariots are the prototype of the tanks of modern warfare.
sentences.chinese: 金屬輪戰車是現代戰爭中坦克的原型。

sentences.english: A soldier in a chariot will resist the Wolf and transform the Cornish people into a Boar.
sentences.chinese: 戰車上的士兵會抵抗狼，把康沃爾人變成野豬。

sentences.english: This temple on which you stand is the Chariot of Helios.
sentences.chinese: 你現在腳下的這座神殿正是赫利俄斯的太陽戰車。

sentences.english: The temple on which Kratos stood, was the Sun Chariot of Helios.
sentences.chinese: 奎託斯腳下的這座神殿，就是赫利俄斯的日頭戰車。

sentences.english: Then the chariot rose up and all the heaven brightened.
sentences.chinese: 然後，戰車上升起來，所有的天空都變亮了。

sentences.english: The chariots and horsemen of Israel!
The chariot of Phoebus is running into the long river.
sentences.chinese: 日神菲比斯的戰車正掉在長河之中。

sentences.english: The Charioteer of York will soothe the people .
sentences.chinese: 約克郡的戰車御者會安慰人們。

sentences.english: Correction of a bug that locks NPCs in chariot's area.
sentences.chinese: 修正了將NPC卡在戰車區域裏的錯誤。

sentences.english: The Mongolian rocket launcher resembles a wooden, fire-spitting demon-wagon.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古軍中之火箭炮車，是噴射火焰的木質魔鬼戰車。

sentences.english: Vehicle monitored by 180 million Brazilian hearts.
sentences.chinese: 被一億八千萬顆心關注的巴西戰車。

sentences.english: So they hired thirty and two thousand chariots, and the king of Maachah and his people;
sentences.chinese: 於是僱了三萬二千輛戰車和瑪迦王並他的軍兵。

sentences.english: They ran for the Warthog parked on the dirt track at the base of the tree house.
sentences.chinese: 他們朝停在樹房下骯髒地面上的疣豬戰車跑去。

sentences.english: Passing beyond narrow defiles, to pursue the enemy some distance, this is terrain which will exhaust the chariots.
sentences.chinese: 越險阻，長途追逐敵人，這就是戰車的竭地。

sentences.english: Each chariot has four bronze horses and a bronzed figure driver.
sentences.chinese: 每架戰車都有四匹銅馬和一個銅製車伕。

sentences.english: In 2013 America hopes to deploy the Radio-Frequency Vehicle Stopper.
sentences.chinese: 美國希望到2013年部署戰車射頻干擾器。

definition: car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
